p.name: Gorgas, William Crawford
Marie D. Gorgas and Burton J. Hendrick, William Crawford Gorgas, His Life and Work (1925).

bibl.title: Letter from Olin West to Jefferson Randolph Kean, March 24, 1925

div1.p: West thanks Kean for reprints of his review of the Gorgas biography.

div1.head: Letter from Olin West to Jefferson Randolph Kean, March 24, 1925
div1.opener:
OLIN WEST, M.D.
SECRETARY
American Medical Association
835 North Dearborn Street, CHICAGO, March 24, 1925
Dr. J. R. Kean,
Colonel, U. S. Army, Retired,
Washington, D. C.
Dear Doctor Kean:
div1.p:
I am very grateful to you for your
kindness in sending me six copies of your
editorial review of the Life of General
Gorgas.

I wish to have these for our Package
Library Service and feel sure that we can
make good use of them in that connection.
div1.closer: Very sincerely yours, Olin West OW:HN
